summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeLong lasting styling requires humidity defense. Kenra Anti-Humidity Spray 5 provides long-lasting frizz and static control. This lightweight formula can be used to finish a variety of styling looks from air-dried natural curls to voluminous blow-outs.
details: DetailsBenefits72-hour frizz protectionLightweight, low hold formulaIncreases manageabilityThermal protection up to 450 degreesItem 2600773How To UseShake Well. Spray 8-10 inches away. Apply all-over to lock-in humidity and static control.IngredientsHydrofluorocarbon 152a, Alcohol Denat., C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Acrylates/Octylacrylamide Copolymer, Isostearyl Alcohol, Parfum/Fragrance, Cocodimonium Hydroxypropyl Hydrolyzed Keratin, Panthenol, Benzophenone-4, Ethylhexyl Olivate, SqualaneShipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.
how_to_use: Shake Well. Spray 8-10 inches away. Apply all-over to lock-in humidity and static control.

reviews.headline: Texas Humidity
reviews.comments: As a Texas Girl with naturally curly hair, mixed with B/W . This is the only product is the ONLY product that prevented a poof. And not run the car and turn the AC on. Im talking outside for hours in the humidity

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again.
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this product. I spray it on my slightly damp or dry hair and never get that humidity frizz. Love, love, love it!

reviews.headline: Don't use it alone!
reviews.comments: Love this spray and it works beautifully when the humidity is under about 60% . I like that i can spray it in before styling because the himidity in the bathroom while blow drying has reverted my roots. THAT SAID- to hold a natural roller set or flatiron outside perfectly, thi MUST be paired with Kenra 26. That hairspray is the truth but it IS a lil sticky. So, if you can get away with one do it. My hair is fine and doesnt like a ton of product but it does well with this. No flaking, no stickiness, no weightiness. When I add on the Kenra 26 it takes me sown from 4-5 day to 3-4 days that I can wear my hair down without it feeling oily and dirty - with a new rollerset in day 3 it will last but these two together are the TRUTH.

reviews.headline: No more frizz
reviews.comments: This product really works. I spray it on my wet hair, style it and spray it on again afterwards. My hair got frizzy the minute I stepped outside and after using several other products I'm so glad I found this by Kendra. Definitely will recommend.

reviews.headline: The best
reviews.comments: Its my firts time, trying this and i love it, everything abou this it's perfect for my frizzy hair

reviews.headline: Works well!
reviews.comments: My hair seems to frizz almost instantly after a blowout. This has helped reduce that by providing a "seal" over the hair. I use a mositurizing shampoo and conditioner, styling cream, then blowdry, followed by a light serum and this spray. It's been very effective for my thick, highlighted, wavy hair that is blow dried smooth.

reviews.headline: Great for humid days - no more frizz!
reviews.comments: Nashville summers are hot & humid. My hair was turning to frizz within an hour of being outside. I bought this  and it works great to seal the ends - no more frizz! It is LOW CONTROL and I still use Kenra 25 after styling to set the style..

reviews.headline: High hopes
reviews.comments: I had high hopes for the product but unfortunately  this product this not work.

reviews.headline: Good Enough for Light Hold
reviews.comments: It's good enough for a light hold (It's a level 5 out of 24, after all) so don't expect your style to last for days or even 24hrs. Doesn't leave a crunch so I'm comfortable using it daily.

reviews.headline: It's useless
reviews.comments: I tried two time  and my hair still got fluffy

reviews.headline: It's useless
reviews.comments: I tried two time  and my hair still got fluffy

reviews.headline: Fantastic
reviews.comments: Great smell,  really like

reviews.headline: Not loving
reviews.comments: Not seeing the results I hoped for in this product.  I will return.

reviews.headline: Water in a bottle
reviews.comments:
I have thick hair with rampant fly aways I was looking to tame. I spray it on, it does nothing. Doesnt help fly aways, doesn't stop frizz, doesnt do anything noticeable at all. I did give it 2 stars for the fact it smells good. 

Now i just use it as a hair perfume without any expectations for it to do anything, and that is the only way im getting myself to finish the bottle. I would not reccomend this product and I do not see anybody benefitting from this but, there are some good reviews, so i guess it works different for everyone

reviews.headline: Stinks and did nothing for my hair.
reviews.comments: Blind buy and I have to say, I am very disappointed. It did nothing for my hair. Did not stop any frizz and it smells bad.

reviews.headline: I was highly impressed. I will be straightening my hair more
reviews.comments: I have multi textured curly hair, 3B to 4C hair. I rarely straighten my hair because it always reverts so easily due to humidity no matter the time of year. This anti- humidity spray worked extremely well. I am highly impressed and I will be buying it again and recommending it to my fellow curly girls. I also use the blow dry spray.

reviews.headline: Humidity fighter
reviews.comments:
My hair frizz is horrible when humidity is up 
This spray works wonders in fighting frizz

reviews.headline: LOVE!!
reviews.comments: I live in Texas, and my hair usually does not hold a curl (I'm talking falls completely flat in 10 minutes). However, this product helps my curls stay in place ALL DAY!! I use it along with the Kenra texturizing spray.

reviews.headline: I love this hair spray
reviews.comments: I recently did a silk press on my natural 3c-4a hair and it kept my hair smooth & did not frizz up not one bit when stepping out into humid weather in Houston, Texas. I love it & will it again. I would love to see how it holds frizz on my hair while curly.

reviews.headline: Not good on wavy hair in heat
reviews.comments: This hairspray did not hold my styled hair at all.  Just fell flat.  Will not buy again.

media.headline: I am returning this product ASAP
I am returning this product ASAP
Did it's job.
media.caption: After 6 hours, and going to an indoor concert

faceoff_positive.comments: I have naturally curly hair and some seasons it can be a nightmare. I don't even bother straightening it because it'll revert to curls in hours. Best defense is a good hair product like Kenra anti humidity spray. I use this product before using my normal hairspray and my hair stays tame throughout the day, even under the elements. The spray is very light, not sticky or stiff. Very good fragrance from the spray, smells like a salon spray. Premium product for your worst frizz!
faceoff_positive.headline: Goodbye frizz!

faceoff_negative.comments: Kenra Professional Anti-Humidity Spray 5 did not do anything for my hair.  Used a little, used a TON, used on less humid days, really humid days, rainy days, and nothing.  Amazingly, nothing.  Still had humidity halo frizz.  Although I did not want any 'hold', there was absolutely no hold whatsoever.  Thought at least some hold might do something, but NOPE, just added alcohol to my hair for no reason - yuck and potentially drying.  And it really likes to spray everywhere, in a haze.  Usually like Kenra products, just not this one.  Gave it two stars because it smells absolutely wonderful, like a mild Lily of the Valley.
faceoff_negative.headline: Did Nothing
